children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting:

asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-router-k8s/0 [idle] unknown: 
  mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting: 
  data-integrator/0 [idle] blocked: Please relate the data-integrator with the desired product
test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:33:02Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     189  10.152.183.86   no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.80   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   58  10.152.183.216  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.99.77         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.99.72         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+2f8472b
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.99.73         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+2f8472b
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.99.78         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.99.76         
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:33:02Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     189  10.152.183.86   no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.80   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   58  10.152.183.216  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.99.77         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.99.72         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+2f8472b
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.99.73         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+2f8472b
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.99.78         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.99.76         
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f4e80c0c460>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f4e80c0c460> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f4e80844a30>.model
